# Integrations

* [Bazel](bazel.md)
* [Cypress](cypress.md)
* [GoogleTest \(C++\)](googletest.md)
* [Go Test](go-test.md)
* [Gradle](gradle.md)
* [Maven](maven.md)
* [Minitest \(Ruby\)](minitest.md)
* [Nose \(Python\)](nose-python.md)
* [CTest (C/C++)](ctest.md)

Not using any of these? Try the [generic file based test runner](file.md) option.
